  • Richard Gibbens

Richard Gibbens

I am a Reader in Network Modelling in the Computer Laboratory, University of Cambridge with research interests in the mathematical modelling of networks especially communciation networks, road transport networks and more recently energy networks.

My teaching includes a range of courses in the Computer Science Tripos and MPhil ACS dealing with fundamental mathematics and its applications in computer science.

I am also a Fellow of Gonville and Caius College, Cambridge.
